articles.author: Emma Parry
articles.title: Justin TImberlake, Jessica Biel spotted for the first time together since his hand-holding incident
articles.description: Justin Timberlake and wife Jessica Biel have been pictured together for the first time since the singer was caught holding hands with a co-star.
articles.content:
Justin Timberlake and wife Jessica Biel have been pictured together for the first time since the singer was caught holding hands with a co-star.
The couple appeared to have put the incident behind them as they were spotted laughing and joking during an intim… [+4507 chars]
